mapper.select: SELECT code_id, goods_id, batch_no, code_value, code_path, code_url, code_occupied, block_flag,create_time FROM qrcode WHERE code_value = #{codeValue}
mapper.update: UPDATE qrcode SET code_occupied = 1 WHERE code_value = #{codeValue}
mapper.select: SELECT is_advanced FROM goods_model where block_flag = 0 AND model_id IN (SELECT model_id FROM qrcode WHERE code_value = #{codeValue} AND block_flag = 0)
select nick_name from component_list where item_id in (select gc.item_id from goods_component gc, qrcode qr where qr.model_id = gc.model_id and qr.code_value = #{deviceID})
select gm.velocity AS velocity from goods_model gm, qrcode qr where gm.model_id = qr.model_id and qr.code_value = #{deviceID}
